title: TOWIE star James Lock insists he's not dating Ellie MacKenzie
text:
James Lock has slammed claims he’s dating Ellie MacKenzie – and says even his mum disapproved of their passionate kiss.

The TOWIE star, 32, insists he 'won’t be pursuing Ellie' and 'it was never going to be anything serious' as he jokingly confesses to 'taking anyone with a pulse.'

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline, James confessed that, 'like many footballers he only attracts a certain type of woman', before quipping he often finds himself lumbered with 'bad b****es!'

Big mistake: TOWIE star James Lock has slammed claims he’s dating Ellie MacKenzie – and says even his mum disapproved of their passionate kiss (taken this month)

James, who was pictured kissing Ellie outside Hakkasan restaurant in London on Saturday, believes he was 'setup' and says he had no intention of going public with the brief fling.

He said: 'Someone set up the photos. Even though I’m on a reality show I’m quite a private person.

'There was a group of us in Hakkasan and I met the girl for a few drinks and it was blown out of proportion.

'It was a nothing thing, it was never going to be anything serious. She’s not someone I was seeing, she’s not my girlfriend, everyone was saying “James’ new girlfriend,” she’s not my new girlfriend. It was something casual.

'There won’t be a second date, I won’t be pursuing her. She’s not a bit of me. I’ve been getting it in the ear from my mum saying she’s not for me!'

'It was something casual': James was snapped kissing Ellie, pictured on her Instagram, last Saturday but insists she is 'not his girlfriend' and 'it was never going to be anything serious'

Former lovers: James, pictured with his ex-girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou in June, admits 'like many footballers he only attracts a certain type of woman'

The kiss came after James' split from ex-girlfriend and co-star Yazmin Oukhellou, 25.

James admitted that he's enjoyed playing the field following the end of their turbulent romance, which saw the couple dramatically clash on and off camera.

He added: 'I’ve gone a bit wild, as you do when you lose that routine of being in a relationship. You see me, I don’t have a type – I’ll take anyone with a pulse!

'I need to find a nice girl but the nice girls don’t go for me I always get the bad b****es!

'The girls' next door don’t go for people like us, it’s like footballers – you only attract a certain type of woman.'

On the hunt: He hopes one day to settle down with 'the girl next door' but says he often gets lumbered with 'bad b*****s' after formerly dating co-stars Yazmin and ex-Danielle Armstrong

James also revealed that he believes Yazmin only pursued a romance with Lauren Goodger's jailbird ex Jake McLean to make him jealous – but insists it didn't have the intended effect.

Yazmin admitted to dating Jake, who was jailed for three-and-a-half years for robbing a family at gunpoint just two days before Christmas in 2006, though confirmed they've already parted ways.

James said: 'Yaz was just looking for a reaction out of me but she didn’t get the one she wanted. I don’t think she’s seeing him anymore.

'It was more to get a reaction out of me. We got into a tit for tat situation.

'But we’ve called a truce now – we’re being civil, we’re now on talking terms. We’ve said lets both grow up and move forward.'

Ahead of Sunday's episode of TOWIE, James says him and Yaz finally make peace and the exes have agreed to put the past behind them.

He said: 'At the beginning it was difficult and things got a little bit spiteful. But now I’m trying to keep a mature head.

'There have been times where I’ve lapsed and done a few silly things and gone on a few silly dates that I probably shouldn’t have gone on.

'But I don’t want to see her hurt, I still care about her. I'm not a malicious person.'
description: TOWIE star James Lock has slammed claims he's dating Ellie MacKenzie and says even his mum disapproved of their passionate kiss. He says their fling was 'never going to be anything series.'
